name: TANKBOX
description:
TANKBOX is a simple action game in which you control your own little toy tank to battle it out against other AI controlled tanks, all residing in a simple wooden box.

  • Local/Online Co-operative Multiplayer. Local co-op requires a controller.
  • Level Editor.
  • Different colored AI tanks have their own unique abilities and personalities.
  • 100 Levels. Most past level 20 are semi-randomized.
